response:
Pupil-involving right oculomotor palsy with ptosis plus contralateral spastic hemiparesis (hyperreflexia, Babinski), contralateral limb ataxia (intention tremor, dysmetria) and impaired dorsal column modalities points to a single right midbrain lesion affecting the oculomotor fascicle, cerebral peduncle, red nucleus/superior cerebellar pathways, and medial lemniscus.

lesion_locations = ["right midbrain tegmentum"]
